title: hw1
text:
import pandas as pd
df = pd.DataFrame({'제품' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'],
                    '가격' : [1800, 1500, 3000],
                    '판매량' : [24, 38, 13]})
df








제품
가격
판매량




0
사과
1800
24


1
딸기
1500
38


2
수박
3000
13







import numpy as np p_mean = np.mean(df[‘가격’]) s_mean = np.mean(df[‘판매량’]) p_mean s_mean
```
